title: "Bivariate Viz Activities"

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# Load data
elections <- read.csv("https://mac-stat.github.io/data/election_2020_county.csv")

# Check it out
head(elections)
```

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(elections, aes(x=winner_20)) + geom_bar(fill="red")  + labs(title="Election Winners", x = "winner", y = "count")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](activity-01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(elections, aes(x=repub_pct_20, y=repub_pct_16)) + geom_point() + labs(title="Election Winners", x = "winner", y = "count")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](activity-01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::
